channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-43500|2024-09-24T18:32:02.003Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 2.4.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified hostname and port using attacker-specified username and password.

item.title: CVE-2023-43499|2024-09-24T18:51:28.365Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 2.4.1 and earlier does not escape Failure Cause names in build logs, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to create or update Failure Causes.

item.title: CVE-2023-43501|2024-09-24T18:27:16.610Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 2.4.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified hostname and port using attacker-specified username and password.

item.title: CVE-2023-43502|2024-09-24T18:25:43.344Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 2.4.1 and earlier allows attackers to delete Failure Causes.
